node.title: William Tyrrell's foster-mother has told her story – this is what she said
node.alt: A boy wearing a Spider-Man suit.
node.description: As the search for William Tyrrell resumed this week, his foster-mother became a person of interest. She denies having any involvement in his disappearance, and has told her story before — this is what she said.
node.content:
["The investigation into William Tyrrell's disappearance has come full circle.", "This week, police have returned to where the three-year-old in a Spider-Man suit was last seen seven years ago \u2014 his late foster-grandmother's home on the NSW Mid-North Coast.", "The ABC understands his foster-mother, who has previously been ruled out, is now a person of interest.", "There have been around 600 persons of interest over the past seven years.", "The foster-mother was one of the first to be ruled out in the investigation's early stages, which NSW Police Commissioner Mick Fuller this week described as \"a mess\".", "In March 2019, the woman, who cannot be named for legal reasons, gave her account of what happened that day to a coronial inquest.", "\"He is roaring like a tiger. He runs around the corner, and I hear another roar. And then \u2026 nothing,\" she said.", "\"And I think, that's really weird. It's just too quiet. I get up, and I walk around, and I go,\u00a0'William, where are you?'\"", "", "
Police have returned to the house in Kendall to conduct a number of new searches.\u00a0(Supplied: NSW Police)
", "She said she searched frantically for 20 minutes and then called triple-0.", "\"Yeah hi. My son is missing. He is three and a half,\" she said on the call, her voice shaking as she gave the address.", "Deputy NSW Coroner Harriet Grahame is yet to hand down her findings.", "A video of William's foster-mother speaking to detectives has previously been released.", "In it, she's seen telling an officer about an\u00a0unsuccessful search for William after he vanished.", "\"I got my head out the window because I'm looking for William,\" she said.", "\"I get to the \u2026 school and I think he's not here.\"", "", "
William Tyrrell's foster-parents speaking with police officers about his disappearance.(Supplied)
", "Kendall, where William's foster-grandmother's house is located, is surrounded by farmland\u00a0and national park.", "In September 2014, the tiny town \u2013 which is home to about 1,100 people \u2013 was thrust into the national spotlight.", "At the inquest five years later, the foster-mother recalled seeing two \"dirty old\" cars parked in the street just before her son went missing.", "Police have been unable to verify her claims.", "Detective Sergeant Laura Beacroft said some witnesses she interviewed were adamant the vehicles were not there.", "The ABC understands one line of inquiry police are probing is that the boy tumbled from the home's second-storey balcony\u00a0and that the foster-grandmother's car could have been used to move his body.", "", "
The car that once belonged to William's foster-grandmother was seized by police last week.\u00a0(Supplied: NSW Police)
", "The grey hatchback, which is now owned by someone else, was seized in Sydney earlier this month and is being combed for clues.", "The balcony fall hypothesis, once previously ruled out, as well as a theory that William's body could have been transferred in a car, are being investigated by police.", "Former lead detective\u00a0Gary Jubelin, who was removed from the case in March 2019 and resigned from the force shortly afterwards, this week said police \"investigated every theory\" under his watch.", "He said the idea William fell from the balcony didn't stack up.", "", "
Former NSW detective Gary Jubelin says he interrogated the foster-parents of William Tyrrell
", "\"I went hard on them,\" Mr Jubelin told Nine radio this week.", "\"I basically ambushed the parents and then interrogated and formally interviewed [them].\"", "Mr Jubelin revealed the foster-mother and foster-father were placed under surveillance, which included bugging their car.", "Like others, who were similarly targeted, it failed to reveal any clues.", "\"Based on the answers to those questions, and the information that we gathered during the covert operation, they were eliminated,\" Mr Jubelin said.", "", "
NSW Police drain creek near home where William Tyrrell was last seen
", "Yesterday, police drained a creek about 1 kilometre from the home where William was last seen", "It took about three hours for Rural Fire Service (RFS) crews to drain the water using a large pump.", "Police officers will be guided by a hydrologist on where to dig at the site.", "", "
Police using a chemical called luminol to search for traces of blood.(AAP: Mike Tsikas)
", "Luminol \u2013 a chemical used to detect traces of blood at crime scenes \u2013 has been sprayed on the garden bed below the balcony.", "Investigators have also used a radar to search beneath a concrete slab that was laid by the property's new owners in the years after William went missing.", "Police say the search, which began on Monday, was sparked by \"new information\", but they have not released what that is.", "No-one has ever been arrested or charged over the death of William Tyrrell. The foster-mother has\u00a0always maintained her innocence, and continues to do so.", "The renewed search is expected to last a few weeks but bad weather could see it grind it to a halt in coming days."]
